subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Real Madrid, the defending champion, has been drawn to face its crosstown rival, Atlético Madrid, in the quarterfinals of the UEFA Champions League in a rematch of last year’s final.
snippet: Real Madrid, the defending champion, has been drawn to face its crosstown rival, Atlético Madrid, in the quarterfinals of the UEFA Champions League in a rematch of last year’s final.
